DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test : 1 . Safety 900 mg 1800 mg WS® 1442 per day overweight subject ( BMI 25 29,9 kg/m² ) 2 . Pharmacodynamic effect WS® 1442 endothelial function versus nordic walk train overweight subject
DOC.detailed_description: 60 overweight subject BMI 25 29,9 kg/m2 include . The safety 900 mg/1800 mg per day WS® 1442 determine adverse event , laboratory parameter , vital sign well treadmill test begin end study . Endothelial function measure two different train modality compare measured intake two different dos WS® 1442 .
DOC.criteria: write informed consent male female subject age 4575 year untrained BMI 25 29,9 kg/m² rest blood pressure sit position ≤ 140/90 mmHg inconspicuous ergometry pregnancy breastfeed current medication intake hawthorn preparation dietary supplement possible influence interpretation study result know disease alcohol drug abuse/addiction nicotine abuse know hypersensitivity ingredient investigate drug inability inadequate ability write speak German notpostmenopausal woman : positive pregnancy test unsafe contraception urinary test find require diagnostic assessment treatment deformation 2nd 5th finger hand prevent adequate measurement endothelial function
